description:
It`s a grand rally for all the Appmon who`ve appeared so far! The Appmon ranking tournament begins, featuring... a 100 meter dash, karuta, and a portrait competition?! Who will be declared the ultimate Appmon?!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Aim for Number One! Appmon Championship in Cyber Arena!
Mezase Kakuzuke Number One! Apmon Senshuken in Cyber Arena!
めざせ格付けナンバーワン! アプモン選手権 イン サイバーアリーナ!
